name: df-st
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cst, crab(s0, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cmap, cch), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), chba), nat1), wral(s1, cch, wral(s2, cch, wi(wss(cv(s1), cfv(cort, cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), chj, cv(s2))), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))))))
comment: Define the set of states on a Hilbert lattice. Definition of [Kalmbach] p. 266. (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
